rules.name: Create_SDR_Follow_Up_Reminder_Timestamp
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5)) OR (3 AND (7 OR 8)) OR (4 AND (6 OR 8)) OR (5 AND (6 OR 7))
